# Government Tender Announcement
## Stage 1: Miette Hot Springs Pipe Chase Rehabilitation, Jasper National Park

**Reference Number:** cb-196-91597086

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-24-0044/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-07-03

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-18, 16:00:00 (TCT)

**Amendment Date:** 2024-07-18

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-08-01

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Procurement Category:** Construction and Maintenance Services

**NPC UNSPSC Codes:** 26120000, 26121500, 26121600, 30102802, 30110000, 30111500, 30130000, 30190000, 41114500, 72100000, 72101500, 72101507, 72101510, 72102300, 72102801, 72121103, 72151200, 72151201, 72151202, 72151204

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Bidder Requirements:** **Eligible Active Suppliers** are invited to submit a bid for the above-mentioned project. The Bidder must be registered for the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to receive the solicitation documents.

**Bid Instructions:**

- Bids can be submitted by email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca
- Fax Transmissions will be accepted; Fax transmission number: 1-855-983-1808
- Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted; Bid documents must be sent as email attachments

**Technical Requirements:**

- The Bidder is required to read, understand and comply with all documentation provided, including drawings and specifications
- The Bidder must conduct a thorough analysis of the site and work to be done, prior to bidding

**Submission Requirements:**

- Bids must be received no later than 16:00:00 on 2024-07-18 TCT
- Late submissions will not be considered
- Bidders must provide evidence of their experience and qualifications in accordance with the solicitation documents

**Additional Information:**

- The contract has a maximum value between $1,000,001 and $5
